item.title: Renewing an expired Apple developer account
item.description: I tried to enroll as an Apple developer and received this error message with no help or guidance from Apple on resolving it: Sorry, you canâ€™t enroll at this time. Your Apple ID is already associated with the Account Holder of a membership. Googling this error message didn’t provide any useful information. Turned out I had once paid for an Apple developer membership a decade ago and forgot about it.
